website_summaries.verdict: For something sweet and spicy that you can easily take anywhere, this is a great option.
pros: When it comes to flavor, it's hard to beat this blend of nuts and sweetened dried fruit
Though there is added sugar, this mix is Kosher, gluten-free, and non-GMO
With a variety of flavors to choose from, these 1.5 oz
packs are a great snack to have on the trail
cons: Many customers find these snacks too sugary, as some of the nuts are sugar-coated and the dried fruit may have added sugar

customer_reviews.title: Got this delicious snack on an airplane, and found it here!
customer_reviews.text: First encountered this, Sahale Snacks Classic Fruit and Nut Trail Mix, on an Alaska Airlines flight. It was super delicious, so I decided to track it down when I got home. This is the same exact product, same size bag, same great taste. Purchased Oct 2019, product expiration date: Jul 10, 2020. The first ingredients are cranberries and apples (with sugar) so it is on the sweetish side, but not overly sweet. The almonds, cashews, and pistachios balance the flavor. It's very tasty. The listing did not have a photo of the ingredients panel, so I uploaded it. I also have a photo of everything that is in one bag. Tastes amazing, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: The almonds are nice and big in this-fresh tasting, the dried blueberries taste great, the large toasted coconut flakes are a nice touch. The lemon infused apples are very different, they taste almost like candy- the texture is like dried fruit candy- soft and chewy and they are very sweet but not too sweet. There's a lot more almonds in this than cashews, but I don't mind because cashews aren't the healthiest nuts anyway. Exp date is 2020 which is nice. I bought these for a healthy snack instead of eating chocolate or cookies, there is only 150 calories for 1/4 cup serving. All around a great product, happy I found these on amazon but a tad pricey.
customer_reviews.author: DwarfBunnyOwner

customer_reviews.title: Sahale Snacks taste great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a road trip I will be taking soon, but ate one pack earlier today to make sure I would like it. Actually very good, nice flavors, but there seems to be a lot more toasted coconut than I was expecting. I like coconut, but I would have preferred to have more nuts or blueberries. The price was reasonable and one bag is 210 calories, so they seem to make for a really good snack. Looking forward to trying other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry H.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Too spicy, mangos too hard
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize just how hot and spicy these would be. If I had, I wouldn't have purchased them. I was expecting a tiny hint of heat, but instead I find that they are very hot. I can only eat them if I drink milk between every bite. The mango pieces are also very hard- as hard as the nuts. I was expecting the mango to be soft and chewy, not hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: exaltata

customer_reviews.title: I've never met a Sahale snack I didn't like!
customer_reviews.text: Y'all, this is just good stuff. The nuts are crunchy and fresh, and the dried fruit satisfies my sweet tooth. I wouldn't call it a trail mix; I don't think it's as salty as most trail mixes, which is refreshing. It's a little on the sugary side, so sometimes I supplement it with extra cashews, which also makes it last longer, because my family and I usually eat the entire pack the day it's delivered. We took it on a walk today, and my daughter shared some with our neighbor. When we walked away, my neighbor texted me asking what it was because she wanted more and needed to buy some for herself. It's addictive!
customer_reviews.author: Happy bling gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch of savory flavor
customer_reviews.text: At first I was taken back by the flavor because they were not sweet like othe Sahale snacks I've had. I saw the mango and didn't really read the description. After reading there is lime and chili flavor it got me and I really like them. This is a nice savory snack with a touch of heat and a bit of sweetness. Definitely a keeper in my snack cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: PURPLES

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: First, let me state that I'm a huge Sahale fan. Their Valdosta Pecans, for example, is the Cadillac of snack foods. It therefore gives me no pleasure to diss this product. It does have a lot of flavor but it is unbalanced flavor. What little sweetness remains from the teeny, tiny pieces of mango, for instance, is completely obscured by the excessive heat of spice. Rather than enhancing the flavor of the various components, the spiciness is in fact all you can taste. If that was the intent, job well done.
customer_reviews.author: M.S. P.

customer_reviews.title: Very bland!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this lovely mix of fruits and nuts, but was sadly let down by the very bland taste! The blueberries are the best bit, and the apples are also ok tho they have no real lemon flavor at all, and both are sweetened. The coconut sadly is not sweetened at all, and really has pretty much no taste! Both nuts are good quality, but have no salt to speak of!! The very few grains of salt in the mix have all stuck to the fruit, which is a bit odd mixed with the sweetness of them. I wont be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: bluejewel24

customer_reviews.title: didn't received what I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a box of 18 Raspberry Crumble and received Blueberry Macaroon. My husband not knowing what I ordered opened a pack and started eating it before I could tell him to stop so I could return it ! The raspberry is 5 star def our fav the blueberry is a 3 not bad but not as good. However I am sure it depends on taste preference. Just so disappointed to not have what we wanted! This is my 3rd time ordering and the first time they got it wrong but come on they don't even look alike -a bright dark pink rapper verses a big old blue one?
customer_reviews.author: Deb Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality & Taste
customer_reviews.text: I received Sahale Snacks Berry Macaroon Almond Trail Mix in March 2018. The “Best If Used By” date is October 23, 2018. This combination is very good. The first ingredient is Almonds, which was predominant in the package. The Lemon Flavored Apple pieces are quite small with Lemon being the only flavor I tasted. The Whole Dried Blueberries are good. I didn’t notice a lot of Cashews or Toasted Coconut Flakes but they were OK. Overall, I liked the Quality & Taste, and would likely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: One of the best snacks
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand, I haven't bought a flavor i didn't like. This is one of my favorite flavors, not too sweet not too salty and a kick of spiciness. Great snack to tide you over between meals, great to carry on you if you are hiking or with little kids that need a nutritious snack (get a sweeter flavor for kiddos though, this one's too spicy for their little mouths).
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty — a bit spicy, so be careful if pepper flavor bothers you...
customer_reviews.text: These snacks are AWESOME!!!! They taste wonderful and are just the right size for a snack. Great for portion control — if they were larger bags, it would be hard not to eat the whole bag. lol This flavor is a bit spicy...it has a kick to it, but I like it. The Korean Barbeque ones are great too. I ordered a box of those also and keep these at work for an afternoon snack since I do not eat lunch at work.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Too much fruit... not much nuts.
customer_reviews.text: Last two cases of fruit/ nut mix was predominantly cranberries. Didn’t look anything like the photo on the package. They changed the ratio from earlier deliveries. I can’t eat a lot of dried fruit so I threw out half of each serving. It used to look like the photo. Not happy with the ratio change and just cancelled my subscribe after receiving for a year. But seasoning is delicious and there are no peanuts which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jersey Shore

customer_reviews.title: Taste bad not like others
customer_reviews.text: Taste bad not like others. I’m very unhappy with the flavor of this package this crumble mix is not what I expected I have purchased other items for you they are fine but this does not taste good at all I am hoping you will write back and exchange it for another crumble maybe the macaroon blend or whatever because I will try it but this one I do not like! And I very rarely complain patricia in Connecticut
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Calories a Little High for the Portion Size, But it Makes for a Perfectly Good Snack
customer_reviews.text: I was still hungry after snacking on just one pack and was searching for another snack less than an hour later, restraining myself from consuming a second pack of this product in one day. As long as you keep a lot of other snacks in your pantry to supplement, you should find this one to be an agreeable addition to your snack rotation. Best By Date was reasonable and the product was also reasonably fresh-tasting. As far as I can tell from other reviews, only the pistachios that come in a different flavor than the Raspberry Crumble that I bought have ever had a contamination issue with its organics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All-time favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: Love these snack packages! I found my first one at a Staples store on a whim, and came to Amazon to find them in larger quantities. I love the mix of nuts and dried fruit, and they always taste good. Perfect addition and replacement for some less healthy snacks I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne M. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: So addictive !!
customer_reviews.text: These were extra yummy and very tasty and a very wise choice instead of hitting up the cookie aisle and choosing to buy a cookie. I don’t think that these are cost-effective though I think that they could be a little bit lower in price but I happen to get them as a add on item which made it more reasonable for me
customer_reviews.author: Lavona S.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Few cashews but love it just the same
customer_reviews.text: Purchased more than once love it !! Yes they have one or two cashews in some packs but not all!!! still very good !! My family loves it and we are transitioning from fat kid snacks
customer_reviews.author: Stacie H

customer_reviews.title: Tasty snack
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy these little packs of flavor. Nice collection of trail mix that helps in a pinch when hungry. Mango tango is probably my current favorite. As with other seasoned products there tends to be extra so I have tried to sift out some to have a lighter dusting of it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Update: Such a shame that you have to blow $25 on other stuff to qualify to add this to an order. Even when the item itself raises that total equal to or above that mark. What the hell Amazon? Not sure why some people don't like this product, tastes may vary due to people being people? I didn't find anything wrong flavor wise, it could benefit from more blueberries & it's other fruit whatever it was. I liked it even if others didn't, an I couldn't find any issues with the flavoring for each item within, was fine to me.
customer_reviews.author: Madara

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two boxes of pouches as stocking stuffers. The macaroon mix is AMAZING! The Pomagranate Vanilla Cashews were good as well and exactly what they are supposed to be but let me repeat that the Macaroon mix is the freaking bomb dot com. (😋I know, I'm ok with it). I can't wait to try the Korean BBQ and the Thai but the Sahale co is putting out a very high quality mix here and I think we'll be devotees forever more. If you're on the fence and reading reviews just do it. You'll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Product Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: This trail mix is delicious, however this product is not as described. I paid $11 for what was supposed to be a grab and go box of 9 snack packs. I received 1 single snack pack. I reported the error and was told my order would reship. I again received 1 single snack pack. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: 00Libby

customer_reviews.title: They have a little heat to them
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Was not expecting them to have a spicy seasoning. I thought they were going to be a sweet mix like the Banana rum pecans or the maple pecans. I will order again at some point.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Can hardly find nut but fruit
customer_reviews.text: This snack is of fruit "and" nut. Interestingly, in this "and", nut never goes over 30% percent. The rest is mainly the rasin.
customer_reviews.author: Floria Tanith

customer_reviews.title: D-E-L-I-C-I-O-U-S
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a nice snack with flavor and quality...and this Berry Macaroon Almond was just right! I bought two packs, but will be buying more! Two other great flavors are the Tangerine Vanilla Cashew & Macadamia and Banana Rum Pecan!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite one
customer_reviews.text: This is really my favorite flavor of all I have tried. The flavor comes all from the nuts and fruits, it’s tastier than only the ingredients themselves, and not to the too-sweet artificial flavor point.(not like the glaze ones which have a strong sweet flavor.) The taste makes you feel no guilty eating it and it’s good!
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Salty man very few dried fruit
customer_reviews.text: Extremely salty and very little dried fruit and I totally forgot there were cashews until I looked on the bag ... If they fix those issues it would be a very tasty treat
customer_reviews.author: Stacie H

customer_reviews.title: quic mid day snack
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the sweetness of the mango and on the back side then comes the savory of the chili powder . makes wanting more.. but one pack gets me over the urge until the next meal of lunch or quitting time to go home for dinner
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice snack
customer_reviews.text: I love these easy to take snacks for when I hike, go for a long walk or just being out and about. I know I pay for the convenience of prepackaged, but no matter how diligent I try to be, I'm just not diligent enough to get my own snacks packaged and ready. These were a very good compromise as they taste great, come prepackaged and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and the perfect snack for our gluten and dairy free family.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a grandchild with allergies to wheat, soy and milk products. Thank goodness no nut allergies! These provide her with a "fun and tasty" snack when other children have treats she cannot have. They are also perfect for travel and they keep her entertained for quite a while. Now I just have to find a place to hide them from my husband who loves them too and he likes the fact that he does not have access to a huge bag that he would eat far too much from.
customer_reviews.author: Tutu on Kauai

customer_reviews.title: I do not like these, the taste is strange
customer_reviews.text: I do not like these, the taste is strange. It also has a bit of a hot spice, which I do not like. The mangos are really hard, almost impossible to chew. I took the bag to work and no one would eat them there either.
customer_reviews.author: JLC10719

customer_reviews.title: Liked
customer_reviews.text: I like this combo. I’m just tired of almonds dominating every thing I buy!
customer_reviews.author: Suky Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lowest sugar contents in any “trail mix” out there
customer_reviews.text: I first ate one of these in an airport waiting for my flight. I chose it because it was the one with the least sugar and everything in it is considered healthy and wholesome. It is VERY hard to find a snack that low in sugar believe me. I felt in love with the coconut twist that trail mixes do not have in general.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but expensive
customer_reviews.text: These little snack pouches are good portions, but cost is expensive for how much you get. Flavor is amazing and I am addicted. They are a good mix of spicy and sweet.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: The size of these power packed mix is perfect. The freshness is evident by the crunchiness of the nuts and the tender chewiness of the fruit .. perfect for snacking solo or as a topping for yoghurt.
customer_reviews.author: N. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Not as sweet as the other sahale flavors
customer_reviews.text: This flavor isn’t as sweet as the pomergranate one or the mango one, which is perfect for me. The nuts were plain, not salted nor sweetened. Great mix of crunch with the coconuts and sweetness from the blueberries
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: Very good and different
customer_reviews.text: I love this blend of nuts and dried fruit, one of my favorite Sahale items, however a bit high in sugar but really tasty and hard to forget!
customer_reviews.author: AlohaCathy

customer_reviews.title: Good, but high sugar
customer_reviews.text: These are really delicious tasting, but it tastes so, so sweet. I actually flipped the package around to see what the actual sugar content was because it was almost too sugary tasting (and I like my sweets!) Looks like there is added sugar to the "craisins". Other than that, it's a great on the go snack. I won't buy again though, was much too sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: These are so yummy. Other than the apple pieces.. I didnt like those. But everyrhinf else was so good!! Perfect for the busy mommy to just throw in my purse or diaoer bag and go. Will re buy
customer_reviews.author: Ella Renae

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Got a sample of these mailed to the office I work at and I’m hooked. Spicy but not “OMG I NEED WATER SPICY!” A lot of flavor and with the chewy mango it’s my new favorite snack.
customer_reviews.author: Fernfam

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Well Portioned
customer_reviews.text: Sahale makes delicious snacks! They would be even better if they used honey instead of sugar and coconut oil instead of sunflower oil. Since they don't use what I consider to be completely clean ingredients, I just don't indulge as frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M. Holladay

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this snack. He cannot eat salty foods and this snack is perfect. Have purchased several times - consistently good.
customer_reviews.author: Manina

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: These are the best snacks. Price is a bit high but wow are they good. I have had at least four flavors of the Sahale snacks and all are good, these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: topher

customer_reviews.title: Inedible Garbage
customer_reviews.text: High in carbs, sugar and extremely high in sodium. So bad that it will have to go directly in the garbage can. Nothing like the picture. Looks like leavings from the bottom of a larger bag of product. I opened several bags hoping to pull out a few nuts but there were no whole nuts.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I love all the pieces in this trail mix. Buying in more of a bulk size is more economical because the individual packs are overpriced at my work cafeteria. Thanks, Amazon and Sahale!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Panning

customer_reviews.title: Sahale Snacks Mango Tango
customer_reviews.text: I always try to buy this snack when on sale. It’s expensive but I find worth it. Has a sweet and hot flavor. It’s good and I don’t feel guilty when I eat it.
customer_reviews.author: NEO

customer_reviews.title: Very good healthy snacks
customer_reviews.text: These are a very good mixed nut snack, for a few reasons: - They are individually wrapped by serving size. I like this for snacking vs. a big can of nuts I tend to eat in one sitting, this is a decent sized serving but not too big. It's hard to find a lot of my favorite nut mixes packaged like this. - Good quality ingredients - Good mix - i.e. you aren't overwhelmed by cheap filler. Cashews, almonds, pistachos, and fruit (apple and cranberry). I feel like every bite has a good amount of both nut and fruit - Salted but not overly salty. Only 3% DV sodium.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!! We LOVE these. I got them on special for $6.20 and only ordered one package of 18 packets of nuts. I soooo regret not ordering 5 packages. However, now they’re too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: sjlcnm

customer_reviews.title: SAHALE snacks are great! Healthy and handy in these packs
customer_reviews.text: WE eat them as such and grind/break up into toppings for fish and other dishes,,,crunchy and flavorful for any dish. Try all of the Sahale snacks..
customer_reviews.author: fletzie

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very tasty.
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. They are the perfect size to keep in your purse or desk drawer for that afternoon snack attack. They are also very tasty. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Stella's Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Great snacks, fresh, taste good and a good value. I usually take some snacks for long trips and these are great for a backpack and traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie & Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wish these cost a little less, and were a little less sweet, but they taste great! Very fresh! I typically eat a pack for breakfast with yogurt and fruit.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Favorite snack
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brand line of snacks, they're healthy and tasty. Great for anyone that can eat nuts and take as a little protein pick me up snack. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: not too sweet - just right!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried most of the Sahale flavors of nut snacks, but most are too sweet for me. I want to feel like I'm eating something healthy, not a dessert. This is my favorite one, by far, of all of their offerings. It's a great mix of flavors. Highly recommend this one. Try it, I think you'll like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: I can see why these are Amazon Best Sellers! I bought variety packs
customer_reviews.text: Yum, I can see why these are Amazon Best Sellers! I bought variety packs, keep extras in purse + glove box, toss on salads, casseroles and ice cream. Bought some for my son and family who are always on the go to sports events for grandkids. They have lots of good protein and healthy fats, and sugar ... but not too much.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other flavors
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoyed the other flavors but this one is not good at all. I wish I could return or get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Suved

customer_reviews.title: Maybe It's A Little Too Good...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice blend--a really good snack. However, it is a small amount of goodies and good-for-yous that wind up being pretty expensive and not at all free of calories. That said, as a once in a while treat, I think you'll enjoy it. The dried blueberries and the coconut really add the so-called "icing on the cake."
customer_reviews.author: M. WaterMelon

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and well packaged
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bags are still easy enough to open. Plenty of air so that the pieces and nuts are whole, not just crumbs. Really tasty, too.
customer_reviews.author: Baking away

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: great product. It would have been nice to have these in a reusable case rather then just having each pack thrown in an Amazon box
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Too much fruit not enough nuts
customer_reviews.text: I found the last few orders of this to have way too much fruit and almost no nuts in them. I didn't enjoy them as much due to this unbalance.
customer_reviews.author: Dodds

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Found them in a vending machine at my mom's Nissan dealership. Knew Amazon would have them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Eats and great snack plus it's healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I could eat these all day long! Delicious, nutritious, and very convenient to carry with you
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wayne

customer_reviews.title: What a wonderful nut company!
customer_reviews.text: Is there a sahale product that isn’t simply delicious 😋 🤤?! Love these! 😛🥰
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cox

customer_reviews.title: Tasty preportioned snack
customer_reviews.text: I'm a busy person, so having something to snack on that isn't junk food is important in keeping me on track - this is one of my favorite flavors of Sahale - tart and tasty at the same time - definitely a go to snack for me
customer_reviews.author: Chris Blakesley

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: So yummy! Very hard to find in the supermarket so happy to find on Amazon. These snacks go great when you're enjoying an adult beverage!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E. Prior

customer_reviews.title: Defected package resulting in excessive spice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this the first time and everything turned out great. In the second batch I ordered, I was completely alarmed as there were whole pieces that appeared to be nuts or part of the mix but were just concentrated, unmixed incredibly condensed spices. It took eating a couple to realize my entire mouth was burning and that the package was defected. I am hoping to follow-up with manufacturer to see if we can obtain a new batch.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Zaidi

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite snacks! Adding them to my subscribe and save made them a killer deal!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Archuleta

customer_reviews.title: Best road snack !
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of snacks !! Mango tango almond Mix is my favorite flavor 😊 great road snack or especially for soccer games ..So I have it ordered automatically every month from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Velasco

customer_reviews.title: Great Snack For Those On The Go
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a lot of time in between meetings, and these are perfect. They are just filling enough, and relatively healthy – Not to mention a great deal if you buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum!
customer_reviews.text: I would love these in the larger packages but everything else about these are perfect. They're delicious and well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: good taste  bag too small
customer_reviews.text: tastes good but bag is too small for the price charged
customer_reviews.author: gayle w

customer_reviews.title: I love all these Sahale snacks
customer_reviews.text: I love all these Sahale snacks, but I keep getting burned buying them on Amazon. This particular order I only got 7 packs when it said it came with 9. I know, not a huge deal, just annoying that they always short me or the ones I receive are stale.
customer_reviews.author: leah johston

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! I have loved pretty much all the Sahale Snacks varieties I've tried, and this is a great more basic one (without added flavors). The combination of sweet/salty and crunchy/chewy is great! I also love having these packs - makes for an easy gluten free snack for work, school, travel, etc. Definitely recommend this blend, and the brand in general - always high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Even picky eaters will love
customer_reviews.text: My husband has to manage his blood sugar but is a picky eater. :) Healthy snacks used to be a problem. This is the first natural snack that he likes! I tried too, and I understand why. Just the right balance of sweet and savory. Really delicious. He tried the other flavors and didn't like those as well. And it's been a couple of months and he's still not tired of eating them once a day. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: T Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are well worth the money. Very fresh and are a lot more money to buy them individually in the store. Came online and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Owen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I originally found this snack product at a store in an airport—it was delicious, but pricey (as snacks at airports tend to be!). I was delighted to find this product at Amazon, with quite a variety of mixes. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Tasty 😋
customer_reviews.text: Yum first tasted these on a airplane trip and had to track down where to buy them. Great snack.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed2018

customer_reviews.title: Expensive snack
customer_reviews.text: They are good. The price was expensive for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Edith R

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The trail mix was alittle harder than I. Expected and not as flavorful. I didn’t detect the raspberry at all I think chocolate might have helped. I was just disappointed all around
customer_reviews.author: Wendy garvey.

customer_reviews.title: No peanuts 🎉
customer_reviews.text: Great travel or on the go snack; love it does not contain peanuts.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Sahale snacks
customer_reviews.text: Loved it the salt and sweet taste is excellent in my opinion. Love the coconut and mango mixed with the almonds and cashew, and then the pop of the blueberry just ties it all together. Yummy!
customer_reviews.author: Spicytrini

customer_reviews.title: A nice tasty mix
customer_reviews.text: I order these with subscribe and save to have with my lunch at work. The nuts are great, and this is a nice mix of flavors. I love nuts, and could easily overindulge so I like having these pre-apportioned packages. I look forward to them with my lunch.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly portioned and ready to eat. I bought these for work to eat in between breakfast and lunch. Keeps me going until I can break for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: donna mueller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite of Sahale snacks
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet by Savage. Love the little spicy kick that goes well with the sweetness of mango bits.
customer_reviews.author: 8NY8NY8

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves these! Hes a truck driver and ...
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these! Hes a truck driver and took them with him, he even asked me to buy more since they were so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Aziza C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are an ideal snack for those on the go. Whether at work or play these fit in a to go bag and meet the protein and carbohydrate needs of the active individual.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend of sweet, salty, chewy & crunchy!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a pack given to me by my aunt and fell in love with these! Perfect blend of sweet, salty, chewy & crunchy! So great to keep with you at all times and a perfect amount to enjoy without over doing it! Love these...wish I could find them locally, but as long as they don't "disappear altogether" I'll be a happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: CJ208

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Loved these healthy snacks. They tasted so good and were fresh. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it felt that it did not have flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Kinda sugary
customer_reviews.text: Good, seemed a little sugary for my taste but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Ry2020

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Go-to snack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these snack packs. Great mix and great flavor. Expensive but worth it for the convenient packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Malanga

customer_reviews.title: They love them. I've had a few packets myself
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for a youth group that ranges in age from 8-18. They love them. I've had a few packets myself. They are delicious. I found the packets to be fresh and well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy snack!
customer_reviews.text: These are great little snacks to keep in my bag. Great flavor and crunch!
customer_reviews.author: tcroc

customer_reviews.title: I love the natural flavors and mix of fruit and nuts!
customer_reviews.text: Simply one of the best mixes of fruit and nuts. We stumbled on upon this product while visiting the Mt Rainer area, and heading out for the day. Perfect to stop hunger.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Piano

customer_reviews.title: Oh So Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I 1st discovered this snack in Home Goods & for anyone familiar with this store - good luck finding something the 2nd time around. That is why I am so happy I can order it through Amazon; I only wish the price wouldn't fluctuate every time I'm ready to order a new shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: It’s delicious period just buy it and taste for your self great snack when on the commute home
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Peralta

customer_reviews.title: Too spicy, mangos too hard
customer_reviews.text: This is for ONE four oz bag. I have ordered Sahale snacks previously on Amazon and for this price it is usual for 6-8 bags
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rose

customer_reviews.title: I love having these on hand as snacks for myself when ...
customer_reviews.text: I love having these on hand as snacks for myself when I'm on the go. Big pieces of nuts and fruit that are really tasty. Very high quality compared to most trail mix type items you find for sale.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Well worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Product taste very good & you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too good! Only buy if you have self control
customer_reviews.text: Great snack for on the go! I just wish that they didn’t have 19 grams of sugar per pack.
customer_reviews.author: Mallori

product_meta.title: Sahale Snacks Classic Fruit and Nut Trail Mix, 1.5 Ounces (Pack of 18)
product_meta.description: Whole roasted almonds, cashews and pistachios. Tart cranberries and dried apples. Take some trail mix along on your next adventure. Beyond Ordinary.
feature_bullets: PERFECT BALANCE – This trail mix of dry-roasted mixed nuts and dried fruits is the perfect blend of sweet and savory. We pair almonds, cashews and pistachios with dried apples and tart cranberries for the ideal mix of crunchy, chewy and of course, always delicious.

GRAB AND GO POUCH – Whether you’re mountaineering or just trying to make it through a jam-packed day, these on the go snacks will keep you satisfied. The conveniently sized nut snack mixes fit into any space, and are always ready when you are. The conveniently sized trail mix individual packs fit into any space, and are always ready when you are.

NON-GMO PROJECT VERIFIED – Delicious and wholesome, these glazed mix nuts are made with simple ingredients and are great Non-GMO* snacks. Plus, they’re made with no artificial preservatives or flavors, no added sulfites, and are Kosher and gluten-free** snacks.

SNACK BETTER – Whether you’re an adventurous culinary explorer seeking out unique flavor combinations or simply looking for a nourishing, portable treat, Sahale Snacks nut mixes are certain to thrill your taste buds.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
